title: Unpacking the world championship road race and TT courses: What do they look like, who do they suit?
content:
Cobbled climbs, marathon time trials, and a gnarly Glasgow circuit all feature in the 2023 races for men's and women's rainbow jerseys.

Read the full article at Unpacking the world championship road race and TT courses: What do they look like, who do they suit? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
